title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosts for Rush on Thursday. Did Biden actually pick Kamala Harris? How should Trump handle Kamala? Rioters and violent illegals are West Coast VIPs. Mike Pence has always been who he is, unlike Harris. Legal Insurrection points out hypocrisy on youth by Kamala. Kasich will speak at DNC, but will Tulsi Gabbard cross over to the RNC? Knowledge is power is a myth - it’s potential. The case for Kamala Harris cannot be made. Democrats are listening to Rush’s show for osmosis learning.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Todd Herman interviews former New York Times reporter Alex Berenson. Scott Atlas is a godsend. The unconscionable COVID lies of the left and media. We must get Joe out of the basement. A reading of a caller’s diary entry proves Kamala wrong. Some journalists hate asking questions and those that do. Architect of the lockdowns walked around with the virus. Remind Americans there is no real Kamala Harris. House Speaker will be president if no election winner is determined by January. Keep your states red for the rest of us.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Republicans refuse to fight the most important battle. The Deep State isn’t a secret government, it’s a career government. Which Kamala Harris are we talking to? The propaganda of silence. There are many ways to perceive a morally malleable person. An October surprise is coming. The sad truth of George Floyd’s death. Police holds are needed for the protection of everyone involved. The cases go up when the masks go up. This election is in your hands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
